extendedIngredients.name: instant chocolate pudding mix
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 (3.4 oz) packages Instant White Chocolate Pudding

extendedIngredients.name: pumpkin puree
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 cup pumpkin puree (not pumpkin pie mix)

extendedIngredients.name: whipped topping
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 (8 oz) container frozen whipped topping (Cool Whip) thawed

recipes.title: White Chocolate Caramel No Bake Pumpkin Pie

winePairing.pairingText: Ice Wine, Moscato, and Vin Santo are great choices for Pumpkin Pie. Vin santo is typically sweet with notes of baking spices and nuts, so it pairs really well with pumpkin spiced desserts. A good sparkling Moscato would work too, and if you feel like splurging, an ice wine. The Schulze Vineyards Vidal Blanc Ice Wine with a 5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 50 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Schulze Vineyards Vidal Blanc Ice Wine
productMatches.description: Distinctive aromatics of candied peaches, apricots and raw honey lavish the senses. Rich and viscous with luscious sweetness balanced by bright acidity. Truly a luxurious treasure which can be attributed to the terroir of the Niagara region. Made using authentic Eiswein techniques.

recipes.instructions: In a large bowl, combine the pudding mixes, milk, pumpkin puree and pumpkin pie spice.  Beat until completely combined and smooth.  Fold in half of the whipped topping.  Spread the mixture into the baked pie crust.  Spread the remaining whipped topping over the top of the pie.Cover the pie loosely with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least an hour. Before serving, drizzle caramel topping over the top of the pie.

steps.step: In a large bowl, combine the pudding mixes, milk, pumpkin puree and pumpkin pie spice.  Beat until completely combined and smooth.  Fold in half of the whipped topping.
Spread the mixture into the baked pie crust.

Spread the remaining whipped topping over the top of the pie.Cover the pie loosely with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least an hour. Before serving, drizzle caramel topping over the top of the pie.
